feed.title: Huntarr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.6.0
entry.content:
• [Huntarr] New Plex Login Authentication (staging for possible requesting shows and movies + easy login method)
  • [User] Expanded size of 2FA key area to enable proper copy
  • [User] 2FA copy and paste works now
  • [PR Request Menu Fix] BugFix - fix duplicate Whisparr v3/eros in App Settings - Thanks @Yeraze

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.6.1
entry.content:
• [Huntarr] When changing apps, sometimes it would ask you to save when nothing occurred when navigating somewhere else. If you clicked the test button and nothing has changed, it would sometimes ask if you wanted to save if you navigated away. This is now fix and patch.

  • [Docs] Updated navigation and donation information.

  • [Apprise] Apprise test notification failed if Notifications level is more than Info - #572 - Patched and will allow test on other log levels.

  • [Logs] [Bug] Setting Authentication Mode to No Login Mode causes excessive log spam - #571 - Patched

  • [All Apps] Radarr config requires http:// to be specified - #569 - When utilizing an IP address, Huntarr no longer cares if you forget to put http and that includes utilizing the test button also.

  • [Sonarr] - Utilizing the test button will warn users that v1-v2 and v5 (preview) of Sonarr will not work with Huntarr. v5 will be added down the road when released (due to their changing API).

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/7.5.12...7.6.1

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.6.2
entry.content:
• Scheduler Fixed for non-global items (was looking for a non-existent json)
  • Changed Docker Builds to stop publishing every change to the main container as the latest. Latest release will push latest build.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/7.6.1...7.6.2

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.6.3
entry.content:
• Resolves time issues for timezones not in the drop down box (https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/574) and respects the TZ variable. Added Hawaii time zone also.
  • Links and docs are further updated to reflect newest changes.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/7.6.2...7.6.3

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.6.4
entry.content: • Fixed unlinking a plex account if the user selected the unlink option (issue: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/573)
